Description: You strike a target with unknown power. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, dealing normal damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 15 or higher, roll a d6 and cause the random effect. | d6 | Effect | |:---:|:-----------:| | 1 | Poison | | 2 | Burn | | 3 | Confusion | | 4 | Frozen | | 5 | Paralysis | | 6 | Sleep |
Scaling: Higher Levels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
